setValue

public void setValue(int value)
Deprecated. As of Jago v6.2.3, this method is not used. The sensor now determines its own value in all modes of operation.

Sets the state of the touch sensor, if in IDEALISTIC mode. If in REALISTIC mode, this method does nothing.

Overrides:
setValue in class StandardSensor
Parameters:
value - The new value for the sensor (usually ON/OFF)

updateVelocity

protected void updateVelocity()
Updates the velocity of this sensor. Since it is always attached to another element, its velocity will match that of its host.

Overrides:
updateVelocity in class MobileElement
